appetizers.name: Smoke Salmon Bites
appetizers.description: These Smoked Salmon Appetizers are fantastic!

appetizers.name: Prociutto Aspargus Puffs
appetizers.description: These  Prosciutto Asparagus Puff Pastry Bundles are an easy and elegant appetizer or brunch idea!

appetizers.name: Cream Cheese Crescent
appetizers.description: Cream cheese squares. Very easy to eat, and very good.

cold sandwiches.name: Club Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: A Club Sandwich is one of the most iconic sandwiches on any menu! Layers of ham, bacon and turkey with juicy tomatoes, crisp lettuce and cheddar cheese create the perfect bite!

hot sandwiches.name: Battered Mahi Mahi Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: COOK LIKE A MAN‚Äù BEER BATTERED MAHI MAHI SANDWICHES

hot sandwiches.name: BBQ Pulled Pork sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Loaded with juicy flavour packed pulled pork smothered in a homemade BBQ Sauce, piled high onto buns and topped with coleslaw.

hot sandwiches.name: BLT Ranch Chicken Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: It is fried chicken topped with bacon, lettuce, tomato and ranch dressing!

desserts.name: Coffee Cake
desserts.description: Perfect for breakfast or brunch with a hot cup of coffee!

desserts.name: Caramel Topped Ice Cream
desserts.description: This ice cream cake is the perfect frozen dessert, with fudge, caramel, and salty pretzels!

drinks.name: Fresh Brewed Iced Tea
drinks.description: Refreshing cold brew iced tea without the tannic, bitter flavors found in regular tea!
